group_1.textCenter: Welcome to the Wings of the Magius.@We're so happy to have you here.

group_1.narration: I can't say it out loud here...@But I still don't trust the@Wings of the Magius,@or even the Magius themselves.
So why did I choose to join?
It wasn't because I wanted to cling to them@or their organization. It was because I@wanted to use the Magius's power to get free.

group_1.textRight: Can I be frank? I don't actually trust any of@you at all.
I'm just here so you can help me break free.

group_1.textLeft: It's fine.
We don't ask for loyalty, just the desire for@liberation.
In fact, there are lots of girls here who@feel just like you do.
If it makes it easier for you to work with @us...
You're free to maintain the stance that we@are only using each other. I don't mind.

group_1.textRight: Wow... And I thought I was pragmatic.@Impressive.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Well, I do have more experience.@I've been doing this much longer than you.

group_1.narration: After I joined the Wings of the Magius, I was@assigned to the Headquarters.

group_1.textLeft: These are the Black Feathers you will @take charge of.
(Wait, that girl... Is she...?)
(She noticed, too?)

group_1.narration: That's when I reunited with you, Ikumi.

group_1.textLeft: And that brings us right up to where I joined@the Wings of the Magius.
You know how it went from there.
Hey, don't look so miserable.
All that stuff is way in the past.
You don't need to feel sorry for me.

group_1.textRight: We're here to make sure we get to have a@future.

group_1.textLeft: Yep.
But more importantly...
You've been out of character for a while now.

group_1.textRight: I'd never ever pretend to be someone I'm not,@ya know?

group_1.textLeft: Sure.

group_1.textRight: Bleh! Fess up, you don't believe me! That's@a big no-no! Mrrraaahh...

group_1.textLeft: You're as intimidating as an angry kitten.

group_1.textRight: If you scribble up an exposé about little ol'@me, tell me when it comes out, 'kay?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? I'm not going to put you in the paper.
You told me that stuff because it was me,@right?
That means it's off the record. It's against@my code of honor to publish it.
What's so funny?
Anyway, I'm all talked out. I think I'm gonna@head home.

group_1.textRight: Gosh golly, it's this late already?! I'm@gonna be in big trouble if I'm late!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah?

group_1.textRight: Let's give it aaall we've got.

group_1.textLeft: You bet.
See you around, Ikumi.
[se:7101_catvoice]Meow!

group_1.textRight: Let me just take a photo... [chara:304601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:304601:cheek_0][chara:304601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:304601:lipSynch_1]Yup, just like@that... Good kitty.

group_1.narration: ― Ryo ―@You're gonna be the star of the@next issue of The Midori Report.

group_1.textLeft: [se:7101_catvoice]Meow!

group_1.textRight: You're gonna make tomorrow's Kitty Cat@Calendar something special!

group_1.narration: I've had to bear this weight from the second@I was born into a life in Daito Ward.
There's no running from it.@You can't change what you were born with.
I've definitely thought of the power@I got from Kyubey as a heavy burden.
But at least I got to think it over and then@choose what to do with the power I got.
Still... It turned out my contract came with@a hidden fee, one I took on unwittingly.
This is something that affects the future@of countless Magical Girls, including me.

group_1.textCenter: (That's the one thing I won't accept.)
Now to hurry home and get my articles in@order.

group_1.narration: I'm prepared to be hated for doing this...@But if it's for the cause.

group_1.textCenter: This is the last time someone's gonna use me@as their pawn!
